components.name: AppComponent
ButtonComponent
components.templateData:
<button
  type="button"
  (click)="onClick.emit($event)"
  [ngClass]="classes"
  [ngStyle]="{ 'background-color': backgroundColor }"
>
  {{ label }}
</button>

components.templateData: {{ title }}

components.name: PokedexSelectDropdownComponent
components.templateData:
<dd-dropdown-link
  [sections]="sections"
  [placeholder]="
    this.currentVersionGroupName
      ? this.currentVersionGroupName
      : 'Select Pokédex'
  "
  [origin]="origin"
></dd-dropdown-link>

PokemonComponent

components.templateData:

Gender Ratio:
